message: Let's start fair. I get 90%, you get 10%.  Hope you agree!
My turn! How about a more reasonable split?  65% for me, and 35% for you.  The clock is ticking!
I'm willing to meet you halfway. 60/40 split is fair, considering the time pressure. Let's end this.
This is getting ridiculous, Alice!  I'll be generous - 55% for me, 45% for you. Take it before inflation eats away at your share even more!
Let's be reasonable. 50/50 is the fairest split at this point.  We both lose more with every round. Agree, and let's end this.
